messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Now that i'm here, let me lay down some rules, Supermatter will not be used, we going solar, weed is now legal, maximise suit sensors or i come knockin at your door

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are lacking a research director and head of security, anybody wanting a promotion nad has a way of proving they deserve the promotion come to they bridge

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everybody but the bartender has suit sensors maxed

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Get the air scrubbers, plasma leak in cargo

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Plasma leak dealt with ladies and gentlemen, please report any more leaks

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please may al employees go to the chapel for the funeral

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: An improvised firebomb was just let off in medical, i caught a glimpse of the person reponsible, they are wearing very bright clothes, that's all the detail i can give

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Oscar is to be arrested on the grounds of sabotage to the station

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!
